metadata.title: CVE-2020-25650 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the way the spice-vdagentd daemon handled file transfers from the host system to the virtual machine. Any unprivileged local guest user with access to the UNIX domain socket path `/run/spice-vdagentd/spice-vdagent-sock` could use this flaw to perform a memory denial of service for spice-vdagentd or even other processes in the VM system. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to system availability. This flaw affects spice-vdagent versions 0.20 and previous versions.

criterions.comment: spice-vdagent package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.20.0-1ubuntu0.1').
